definitions.definition: Someone who solicits customers for prostitution and acts as manager for a group of prostitutes; a pander.
A man who can easily attract women.
To act as a procurer of prostitutes; to pander.

definitions.example: The smooth-talking, tall man with heavy gold bracelets claimed he could pimp anyone.

definitions.definition: To excessively customize something, especially a vehicle, according to ghetto standards (also pimp out).
definitions.example: You pimped out that motorcycle f'real, dawg.

definitions.definition: To ask progressively harder and ultimately unanswerable questions of a resident or medical student (said of a senior member of the medical staff).

definitions.example: I gotta show you this sweet website where you can pimp your blog and get more readers.

definitions.definition: To persuade, smooth talk or trick another into doing something for your benefit.
definitions.example: I pimped her out of $2,000 and she paid for the entire stay at the Bahamas.
